rdf:Description.dc:title: Alive! : adolescents and alcohol and driving 1988 adolescents and alcohol and driving /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Alcohol and Drug Abuse Commission.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Summary: Lesson plans and resource materials for teachers wishing to explore issues related to drinking and driving with their junior high students.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Drinking and traffic accidents.
